headline: Anthropic Token Usage Reverts After Promo Glitch
bullets: Anthropic's token usage seemed reduced due to an error post-promo.
The 2x usage promo ended, returning token allowance to standard levels.
hot_take: Is this a promo hangover or a warning sign for Pro users?

headline: Claude 2.1.5 Bugs Force Downgrade
bullets: Users report stability issues with Claude 2.1.5, opting to downgrade.
No official fix announced, prompting concerns over update quality.
hot_take: New isn't always better: When to hold off on AI updates.
